title: Urgent Opening- Tax Consultant- Advisory Role (Life Insurance)- Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: Corporate Taxation,Direct Tax,Indirect Tax,Tax Compliance,Tax Audit,TDS,Tax Returns,GST

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
Urgent Job Opening a leading client life insurance industry for their office in Mumbai


Role: Tax Consultant- Advisory

Qualification: CA is mandatory


We can look from Life Insurance industry or Big4 group.


Job Purpose:

To undertake and manage tax compliances pertaining to Direct/ Indirect/ other taxes including Income Tax, Goods and Services Tax, Professional Tax and maintain tax database.


Roles & Responsibilities:

  • To prepare and undertake tax compliances (including tax payments, tax returns and reconciliations) within due dates
  • To respond toS OLVO queries within TAT
  • To collate and provide requisite data/ information to Tax consultants, Auditors &Outsourced Vendors for compliance matters
  • To prepare tax dashboards and circulate on monthly basis.
  • To coordinate with IT and other business functions for tax related system developments
  • To maintain updated tax database for all tax compliances
  • To guide junior team members for tax operations
  • To assist team with all activities pertaining to tax compliances and operations.


If Interested, kindly share your updated cv on shweta@topgearconsultants.com

title: Urgent Job Opening For Executive - Accounts Receivable
tagsAndSkills: Indian Accounting,Billing,Accounts Receivable,Invoice Generation,Cash Applications,Application,Indian,Accounting
jobDescription:
Hi All,


We are hiring for one of our Premium MNC client for Accounts Receivable Executive role for Mumbai Location.


Please find roles and and responsibilities below:


  • Obtain proper approval, check due/overdue status, and update collection information before releasing containers/BL.
  • Submit invoices/PODs to customers, proactively resolve queries, and coordinate with departments for efficient payment and collection processes.
  • Ensure prompt follow-up and collection of due/overdue payments.
  • Circulate accurate weekly/monthly outstanding reports to the business and actively participate in review calls.
  • Provide support to the GL team in reconciling open items during bank reconciliation.
  • Regularly follow up with customers for TDS certificates and perform quarterly reconciliations.
  • Conduct timely customer reconciliations to maintain accurate financial records.
  • Effectively manage the full and final settlement of customer accounts.
  • Perform quarterly customer balance confirmations and ensure consistent debt collection for internal and external audits.
  • Promptly notify the business about dishonored cheques, monitor subsequent collections, and circulate monthly reports.
  • Handle disputed accounts to expedite pending collections and align payments with agreed terms.
  • Efficiently manage customer master blocking and unblocking in cases of cheque dishonor, overdue outstanding, or inactive status.


Kindly share your updated CV on deeksha.ka@peoplefy.com

title: Openings For Senior SOC(Security operations Center)
tagsAndSkills: Cyber Security,Security Operations Center,Azure Sentinel,Elk,SIEM,cert,Logrhythm,SOC
jobDescription:
Necessary Competency:

  • Deep understanding of Security Operations Centre with subject matter expertise in Incident response for cyber security incidents
  • Knowledge of static and dynamic malware analysis, attacker tools and techniques and incident response procedures
  • Displays a proven track record in leading and managing a threat response team with emphasis on proactive threat identification, analysis and response.
  • Knowledge of various Threat Intelligence platforms and their formats.
  • Knowledge of threat hunting, deception, deep security, IDS/ IPS
  • Strong interpersonal, analytical, and customer service skills, including the ability to explain complex technical terms in language understandable to the business.
  • Strong critical thinking, problem solving and root causes analysis skills
  • Understanding of networking and communication techniques including WANs, LANs, Internet, Intranets, and protocols such as TCP, UDP, and IPSEC.
  • Ability to present technical concepts to non-technical audiences
  • Has a detailed understanding of emerging threat landscape, including threat actor classifications.
  • Keeps abreast of adversary tactics, techniques and procedures, intelligence reporting and the organizations security strategy to enable the practical application of intelligence to information security.
  • Stays current with the cyber intelligence community to maintain/develop formal and informal sources of information and incorporate industry best practices where applicable.
  • Builds effective and collaborative peer-level relationships.
  • Ability to lead, coach and advise team members; effectively manages across cultural and generational boundaries.
  • Drives continuous process improvement.
  • Demonstrates excellent analytical and problem solving skills.
  • Demonstrates and encourage innovative thinking, continuous learning and sharing of best practices.
  • Possesses knowledge of CERT functioning

Mandatory Knowledge:

  • Hands on SIEM Solution (LogRhythm / Azure Sentinel / ELK), use case implementation and design of parsers.
  • Malware analysis â€“ static and dynamic
  • Phishing Email analysis and identifying the IOCs by URL/ attachment analysis using Sandboxes
  • Open source technologies implementation and administration
  • Kill Chain, Threat intelligence management
  • Penetration testing & application security
  • Incident response process and incident handling skills
